spec_data.Name: perl-Tie-Handle-Offset
spec_data.Description:
This modules provides a file handle that hides the beginning of a file.
After opening, the file is positioned at the offset location. seek() and
tell() calls are modified to preserve the offset.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:52:37 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tied handle that hides the beginning of a file
